subtitles.text: Yes, so did you cry on your knees during rehearsals the day before?

I cried?

Yes, of course.
Everyone was wondering which way to go.
It would be a problem if we put more pressure on them.

Harukun, what did you do about your ex?
Is it me?
I wonder...
Hmmm...
Well...

I think it's best to say, "It's probably fine.

Yes, now that I think about it, I feel like I really bothered him.
I don't think I was bothering them, but I don't think I knew that they were aware of me at that time.
That's how blind I was to the world around me.
That's how it turned out.
The staff explained to me very carefully what I should say to each person at this distance. The staff explained to each person in detail what they should say from this distance.
I felt again how grateful I was for their help.
And then the day of the competition came, and you had to do all 10 competitions by yourself.

Physically, it was pretty tough.
When I get out there and do it, I'm totally exhausted, but when it's over, I'll be back the next time.
